mapper.insert: INSERT INTO behavior_records (behavior_category_id, user_id, start_time, end_time, detail) VALUES (#{behaviorCategoryId}, #{userId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{detail})
mapper.select: SELECT r.behavior_records_id, r.behavior_category_id, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.detail, c.content FROM behavior_records as r LEFT JOIN behavior_category as c ON r.behavior_category_id = c.behavior_category_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(r.start_time) = #{reqDate};
mapper.update: UPDATE behavior_records SET behavior_category_id = #{behaviorCategoryId}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, detail = #{detail} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND behavior_records_id = #{behaviorRecordsId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM behavior_records WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND behavior_records_id = #{behaviorRecordsId}
